summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ASD detection system with live camera capture, PDF report generation, and enhanced recommendations. All core features working correctly with risk-level based recommendations.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 instead of 404 for non-existent assessment reports

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Start Assessment button
4-step assessment form flow (Demographics, Behavioral Q1-5, Q6-10, Image Capture)
Camera capture modal opens with controls (capture, switch, close buttons)
Upload from device option present and configured
Assessment submission with different risk levels (Low/High tested)
Results page displays with risk level card
5 recommendation tabs work (Medical, Therapy, Yoga, Lifestyle, Nutrition)
Risk-specific recommendations (High risk shows ABA therapy, medications)
PDF report generation and download functionality
Progress bars for ASD probability and model confidence
ML model prediction with risk level calculation
